I'm not sure I like the proposed change.

There is no easy way to calculate the test progress so it seems a bit pointless having a progress bar.

Either the test is running or it is not; and the existing indicator works well for that.

I would argue that there is progress as the tests execute, one just cannot show how far to the end. For this purpose the progress bar supports the suggested mode. I also believe this is the native way of indicating progressing execution.

Sorry, but I have to disagree.

It's only possible to to show whether the test is still running or not; for that the green icon is very effective.

I find the constantly moving progress bar quite irritating.
